item.title: Through the Bible Study - 1 Timothy 5 | #M1-600 | 5/30/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: In 1 Timothy 5, Paul talks about how we are to treat others, specifically how we are to treat the elderly and young women in the church. Brett discusses the importance of purity as it relates to relationships with single men and women.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: fathers, defense, self-defense, purity, widows, stay at home moms, homemakers, working mothers, dating

item.title: Let No Man Despise Thy Youth - 1 Timothy 4:12 | #S1-580 | 5/27/2012 | Sunday
item.description: Today, we look at 1 Timothy 4:12, where we see Paul encourage the youth of Timothy's church. Pastor Brett talks about the importance of both the youth and the elderly in the church.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: youth, ministry, kids, youth ministry, young people, elderly people, Joseph, Daniel

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 1 Timothy 3:8-4 | #M1-599 | 5/23/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: Last week we studied the role of the elder in the church. In the latter half of 1 Timothy 3, Paul discusses the role of a deacon, and Brett talks about how we utilize Paul's words to Timothy at Athey Creek.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: church leadership, leadership, deacon, ministry, volunteering, alcohol, drinking, finances, accountability, sound doctrine, deaconess

item.title: Doctrines of Devils - 1 Timothy 4:1-6 | #S1-579 | 5/20/2012 | Sunday
item.description: In 1 Timothy 4, Paul warns Timothy to look out for three things that could break up a church: demonism, relativism, and legalism. Pastor Brett elaborates on these three things, how they are seen in our culture today, and what we as Christians can do to combat them.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: the devil, Satan, hell, last days, demonism, relativism, legalism, spirituality, conscience, tolerance, abortion, homosexuality, Catholocism, alcohol, smoking

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 1 Timothy 3:1-7 | #M1-598 | 5/16/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: Tonight, we study 1 Timothy 3, where Paul takes a closer look at the importance of having elders in the church, what the role of an elder should look like, and the qualifications of being an elder. Pastor Brett talks about how the elders at Athey Creek are appointed, and how we use this section of scripture to go about that process.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: creation, bishop, pastor, elder, minister, leadership, alcohol, drinking, qualifications

item.title: Mother's Day 2012 - 1 Timothy 2:15 | #G-185 | 5/13/2012 | Sunday
item.description: This morning we continue to look at 1 Timothy 2, where Paul discusses women's roles in the church. We pay particular attention to verse 15, where Paul says that women will be "saved in childbearing", and we take a closer look at what that really means.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: Mother's Day, women, Mary, childbirth, sin, roles of women, salvation

item.title: How To Behave In Church - 1 Timothy 3:14-15 | #S1-578 | 5/12/2012 | Sunday
item.description: As we continue our study through 1 Timothy, we take a closer look at chapter 3, where Paul talks to Timothy about how (not if) we are to go to church. Pastor Brett talks about the importance of preparing to receive the Word before going to church.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: church, tradition, denominations, organized religion, humility

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 1 Timothy 2:9-14 | #M1-597 | 5/9/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: We take some time to see what Paul has to say about women's roles in the church. It can be really easy to take something out of context in the Bible. Tonight, we focus on what Paul's words to the women of the church mean, and how they apply to the women of the church today.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: women, women's roles, men's roles, church, modesty, clothing, Dorcas, salvation, women's liberation

item.title: True Godliness - 1 Timothy 2:2 | #S1-577 | 5/6/2012 | Sunday
item.description: There are many interpretations of what the word "godliness" means. In 1 Timothy 2, Paul talks about what it means to be godly as a Christian. Today, Pastor Brett talks about godliness and how we can be godly in this day and age.
item.author: Brett Meador

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 1 Timothy 1:17-2:15 | #M1-596 | 5/2/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: As we continue our study through Paul's letter to Timothy, we see Paul talk to Timothy about some of the issues Timothy was having with his church. These are issues that are definitely applicable to the way things are today, and Pastor Brett discusses how we can relate these things to our lives.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: praise, faith, salvation, baptism, Mormonism, mediator, prayer, women in ministry, women's roles

item.title: First of All…Prayer - 1 Timothy 2:1-3 | #S1-576 | 4/29/2012 | Sunday
item.description: Today, we take a moment to talk about prayer. Paul talks with Timothy about prayer, and we see an excellent Old Testament depiction of how we are to pray in Daniel 6.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: prayer, lifting hands, supplication, intercession, thanksgiving, thankfulness, Daniel

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 1 Timothy 1:1-18 | #M1-595 | 4/25/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: Tonight, we delve further into Paul's first letter to Timothy. We discover that the intent of Paul's letter was to encourage Timothy, but also to instruct him in the ways of the Lord.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: doctrine, Micah, church, apostle, hope, Timothy, legalism, vain jangling, the law

item.title: The Biggest Sinner - 1 Timothy 1:12 | #S1-575 | 4/22/2012 | Sunday
item.description: This Sunday, we begin our study in 1 Timothy. Here, we see Paul discuss with Timothy the magnitude of salvation and what it means to be saved.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: sin, salvation, saints, humility, judgment, comparing, legalism

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Thessalonians 2-3 | #M1-594 | 4/18/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: As we wrap up our study through Paul's second letter to the church at Thessalonica, we learn about the importance of avoiding bitterness. We also continue to learn about end times, predestination, and salvation.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: justice, vengeance, rapture, salvation, predestination, sin, homosexuality, bitterness

item.title: The End: Description of the Antichrist - 2 Thessalonians 2:1-12 | #S1-574 | 4/15/2012 | Sunday
item.description: This morning, we delve further into 2 Thessalonians as it relates to end times. We turn our attention to what the Bible says about the antichrist, a man of sin and a son of perdition.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: end times, antichrist, world leaders, Iran, Mahdi, tribulation, perdition, pride

item.title: Through the Bible Study - 2 Thessalonians 1 | #M1-593 | 4/11/2012 | Wednesday
item.description: Tonight, we begin our study through Paul's second letter to the church at Thessalonica. Pastor Brett gives us a little history as to why this letter was written. Additionally, we see Paul encourage the Thessalonians in praise, in promise, and in prayer.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: hell, heaven, false teaching, false prophets, correction

item.title: Easter Sunday 2012 - Acts 17:16-34 | #G-184 | 4/8/2012 | Sunday
item.description: On this Resurrection Sunday, we celebrate Jesus' incredible gift of salvation that He gave us on the cross. Pastor Brett spends this morning discussing the mockers of the Christian faith, the procrastinators, and those who believed.
item.author: Brett Meador
item.keywords: death, resurrection, crucifixion, Easter, Paul, communion
